Description: Validate the coverage category label and coverage/term configuration for Optional Accident Benefit
Action: 1. Login and navigate to Policy coverages under Product Model
Expected Result: 1. User sees coverage category labeled "Optional Accident Benefit" and listed coverages match product model specification

Action: 2. Inspect coverage terms for Optional Accident Benefit
Expected Result: 2. Coverage terms are displayed and configured as specified in the product model (columns referenced)

Action: 3. Verify visibility of changes highlighted by Jira 25262 columns
Expected Result: 3. All changes highlighted in columns I,K,O,T,AB,AT,AV are visible in the UI

Description: Validate the three bundle options display as Coverage under Product Model
Action: 1. Navigate to Product Model -> Coverage definitions
Expected Result: 1. User sees Bundle 1, Bundle 2 and Bundle 3 listed as Coverage (as per Column K)

Action: 2. Expand each bundle to view components
Expected Result: 2. Bundle components match the definitions: Bundle 1 - Home Care + Death + Funeral + Other Expenses; Bundle 2 - Driver + Caregiver; Bundle 3 - Enhanced

Test Case Name: TC03_Verify New Coverages Availability_By Effective Date_Fleet_ProductModel_AC2_date
Description: Validate new coverages are available only on/after July 1, 2026
Action: 1. Create or open submission and set policy term effective date to 2026-07-01
Expected Result: 1. New coverages (Non-Earner Benefit, Caregiver Benefit, Lost Education Expenses, Expenses of Visitors, Housekeeping & Home Maintenance, Damage to Personal Items, Death Benefit, Funeral Benefit, Income Replacement option 400) are available for selection

Action: 2. Set policy term effective date to a date before 2026-07-01
Expected Result: 2. The new coverages are NOT available for selection (they are hidden/disabled)

Test Case Name: TC04_Verify Expiry Of Existing Coverages_On/After Effective Date_Fleet_ProductModel_AC4
Description: Validate specified existing coverages expire on/after July 1, 2026
Action: 1. Set policy term effective date to 2026-07-01
Expected Result: 1. Caregiver, Housekeeping & Home Maintenance; Death & Funeral coverages are expired/removed as per product model

Action: 2. Set effective date before 2026-07-01 and verify
Expected Result: 2. The above coverages remain available when effective date is before July 1, 2026

Description: Validate existing coverages remain unchanged across effective dates
Action: 1. Navigate to Policy coverages and inspect: Medical, Rehabilitation and Attendant Care Benefit; Catastrophic Impairment Benefit; Dependent Care; Indexation Benefit
Expected Result: 1. All listed existing coverages are present and unchanged in configuration and limits regardless of effective date

Action: 2. For effective date on/after 2026-07-01 verify no unintended expiry
Expected Result: 2. The listed existing coverages remain active and unchanged

Description: Validate OPCF 47 is expired for policy terms on/after July 1, 2026 under Exclusions & Conditions
Action: 1. Open Exclusions & Conditions for a policy with effective date 2026-07-01
Expected Result: 1. OPCF 47 (Agreement not to Rely on SABS Priority of Payment Rules) is expired/removed as an available condition

Action: 2. Open Exclusions & Conditions for a policy with effective date before 2026-07-01
Expected Result: 2. OPCF 47 remains present/attachable for policies effective before July 1, 2026

Description: Validate OPCF 47R is attached for policy terms on/after July 1, 2026 under Exclusions & Conditions
Action: 1. Open Exclusions & Conditions for a policy with effective date 2026-07-01
Expected Result: 1. OPCF 47R is automatically attached/available for attachment (mapping/inference handled in separate forms story)

Action: 2. Confirm behavior for policy effective date before 2026-07-01
Expected Result: 2. OPCF 47R is not attached for policies effective before July 1, 2026
